meanings.definition: The act of spoiling the appearance of something
meanings.sent1: The disfigurements on the statue were caused by vandals.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't bear to look at the disfigurements on her once beautiful painting.
meanings.sent3: The disfigurements on the cake made it look like a messy art project.
meanings.sent4: The disfigurements on the landscape were like scars on nature's face.
meanings.sent5: The disfigurements on the dress were so severe that it was beyond repair.
